description: Added hint label on the main menu for opening Settings and Info modal windows
Added Discord RPC state depending on page URL
Added extra labels on /account and /player pages
Added Updates modal window.
Added more sorting options for Inventory modal window
Added designation for equipped skins
By clicking Escape, modal window will be closed
Added Powered by Tricko label in skins render
Updated Info and Settings modal windows
Client window will be opened on full screen size (excluding fullscreen mode in case it is not enabled)
Updated Inventory modal window
Fixed an issue with adblocker
Updated Inventory modal window
Added inventory skins export
Updated Info and Settings modal windows
Added Inventory modal window
Changed background on main menu
Changed swapper conception. Inspired by Juice Client
Moved config.json file from AppData to Documents/VoxtulateClient
Updated Discord Rich Presence buttons
Added popup notifications for some settings which require relaunch & copy buttons
Added Voxtulate client support on Mac and Linux
Added input file option for custom crosshair
Updated Settings modal window
Updated Info modal window
Registered voxtulate:// protocol for opening the client
Added Discord Rich Presence support
Updated README.md file
A dialog window will be sent when user opens the client for the first time
Optimizations
Bug fixes
Added time left for market and listed items
Added first prototype of inventory sorting
Added Clear Data button which clears cache
Custom JS/CSS, Chat Opacity, Crosshair, and Mini Console settings will be applied without client relaunch
Added custom keybinding option for client-related features
Added user interface for swapper and keybinding in Settings modal window
Links in Info modal window will be opened in external browser
Updated Voxtulate logo on the main menu
Added Info modal window
Updated README.md file
Added Voxtulate logo on the main menu
Added range input to change in-game chat opacity
Bug fixes
Added fullscreen mode option by opening client
Client will prevent opening new windows
Updated update dialog window
Added first prototype of resource swapper via config.json
Added Open Configs button
Fixed Voxiom.io's bug with opening dropdown menu
